We make Ice Cream Party Packs by request. Lovingly made by local chefs, they are the perfect ice cream treat for any party!
Call us if you want to make a specific choice, we likely can accomodate you! We can also accomodate most allergen requests, like non-dairy, vegan, gluten-free, and Kosher.
